text:
The Controller shall pay out of any appropriation created for the purpose any reward authorized pursuant to Section 
10.177-2 above, provided that an application for such reward is filed pursuant to the procedures established by the Assessor's office, the Assessor has recommended an amount of reward be paid on the application, and the recommended reward is approved by the Board of Supervisors. 
(Added by Ord. 28-06, File No. 051759, App. 2/16/2006; Ord. 48-11, File No. 110068, App. 3/16/2011)
